column1: '''Nicholas Guildford''' (born in [[1937]]) was a member of the [[Notion Club]].

Guildford was an archaeologist and the Club reporter. He was seldom recorded as reading anything to the Club, and it was then not reported; but he appears to have written several novels.<ref name="Foreword">{{SD
In one of the meetings, after [[Michael George Ramer
column2: Ramer]] had finished reading his story, Guildford criticized it for not having a convincing method of transportation across the space, deeming it highly unlikely or even impossible for humans to ever (in flesh) get to another planet.<ref>{{SD
